tha-ap106:0.3_0: Hearing a lamp of the senior monks, holding a lamp,
tha-ap106:2.1_0: since I was doing nothing wrong,
tha-ap106:2.4_0: to the teaching of the Buddha.
tha-ap106:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap106:4.1_0: and created by the bonds of carrion,
tha-ap106:4.2_0: And they are a wheel-turning monarch.
tha-ap106:4.4_0: dwelling of the four primary elements.
tha-ap106:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap106:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pūraṇa Kassapa.
tha-ap106:7.1_0: with clearing throats, by the senior monks.
